title: Verify Home page entrance image responsiveness and styling
description: Ensure that the featured entrance image on the Home page scales appropriately with correct shadowing across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

steps.description: Navigate to the Home page on desktop resolution
Check the entrance image scales correctly and shadow is visible and consistent with design
Resize viewport to tablet resolution and reload Home page
Verify entrance image responsiveness and shadow styling remain consistent
Resize viewport to mobile resolution and reload Home page
Confirm entrance image scales properly without cropping or distortion and shadow is correct

title: Validate global header navigation links and active state
description: Check that the header navigation links (Home, Works, About, Brief) navigate correctly and show appropriate active link highlighting, and the logo link returns to Home page.

steps.description: Load any page with the global header visible
Click on each navigation link one by one: Home, Works, About, Brief
Verify page navigates correctly to each respective page
After navigation, check the respective nav item for active state styling
Click the logo in the header
Confirm navigation back to Home page and active state updates accordingly

title: Ensure Works page grid responsiveness and hover interactions
description: Validate that the Works page displays a grid of projects with the correct number of columns depending on device size, and that hovering or tapping project thumbnails shows the correct visual feedback for both image and video thumbnails.

steps.description: Navigate to the Works page on desktop
Verify grid columns count matches design specifications for desktop
Hover mouse over project image thumbnail
Check that hover visual feedback is displayed with correct opacity and styling
Hover mouse over project video thumbnail
Check that hover visual feedback is displayed and video thumbnail plays or animates as expected
Resize viewport to mobile and tablet sizes and reload Works page
Verify column count adjusts responsively and tapping project thumbnails triggers visual feedback

title: Validate Project Detail page slider behavior on desktop
description: Ensure the Project Detail page displays split-screen layout with a slider/swiper for images and videos that supports navigation clicks, autoplay media, and respects layout constraints on desktop devices.

steps.description: Navigate to a Project Detail page on desktop
Check the layout uses a split-screen format with a sticky info sidebar
Use navigation arrows or click to move between slider items
Verify slider transitions smoothly to next/previous images or videos
Confirm videos autoplay upon slide visibility without cropping or distortion
Ensure high-resolution images are displayed without layout overflow or breaking constraints

title: Validate Project Detail page slider behavior on mobile and tablet
description: Ensure the Project Detail page slider supports swipe gestures for images and videos, with autoplay functionality and responsive layout on mobile and tablet devices.

steps.description: Open a Project Detail page on a tablet device or mobile viewport
Verify layout switches to swipe-enabled slider without split-screen
Use swipe gestures to navigate between slider media
Check that slide transitions happen smoothly without delay or jank
Confirm videos autoplay correctly respecting aspect ratio and layout constraints

title: Verify Works page scroll restoration after navigating back from Project Detail
description: Check that when users navigate back from a Project Detail page to the Works page, their previous scroll position is preserved correctly.

steps.description: Go to Works page and scroll down several projects
Select a project to navigate to its Detail page
Use the browser back button or site navigation to return to Works page
Confirm the scroll position is restored to where the user left off

title: Check About page typography and responsive layout
description: Validate About page uses hanging indent for resume list, proper capitalization, and responsive column stacking on mobile devices.

steps.description: Navigate to the About page on a desktop viewport
Verify the resume list uses hanging indent styling
Check that text capitalization matches design guidelines
Resize viewport to mobile resolution
Confirm columns stack vertically without layout issues

title: Validate custom SVG cursor behavior across device types
description: Check that custom SVG cursors appear on pointer devices and adapt or hide appropriately on touch devices.

steps.description: Open the site on a desktop browser with a mouse pointer
Verify custom SVG cursor is visible and interactive
Open the site on a mobile or tablet touch device
Check that the SVG cursor hides or adapts as expected without interfering with touch actions

title: Verify font rendering and consistency across browsers
description: Ensure that custom Korean and other fonts render correctly without flickering or inappropriate font weight across supported browsers including Safari.

steps.description: Open key pages (Home, Works, About) in latest Chrome
Confirm fonts render correctly with no flickering, correct weight, and proper Korean text display
Repeat test in Firefox
Verify consistent font rendering with no visual defects
Repeat test in Safari
Ensure fonts render crisply and match intended styling without issues

title: Test video thumbnail playback on iOS Low Power Mode
description: Confirm that video thumbnails on the Works page maintain correct aspect ratios and playback smoothly without black bars or cropping when Low Power Mode is enabled on iOS devices.

steps.description: Using an iOS device, enable Low Power Mode
Navigate to Works page
Select projects with video thumbnails and observe playback
Verify aspect ratio is preserved and no black bars, cropping, or playback errors occur

title: Validate smooth page transitions and absence of errors
description: Check that page transitions occur seamlessly with no visible glitches, console errors, hydration mismatches, or 404 errors throughout site navigation.

steps.description: Navigate through all main pages: Home, Works, individual Project Detail, About, Brief
Observe page transition animations for smoothness without flicker or jump
Open browser developer console and verify no errors or warnings occur during transitions
Use browser dev tools network panel to check for any 404 errors
Confirm no 404s or hydration mismatch warnings appear

title: Verify known regression fixes: matching thumbnail sizes and mobile footer positioning
description: Confirm that the fix for matching TD & Academic thumbnail sizes on Works page and correct mobile footer positioning on Home page are implemented and no regressions occur.

steps.description: Load Works page and visually compare the thumbnail sizes for TD and Academic projects
Verify thumbnails match in size without layout shifts
Load Home page on a mobile device
Check that the footer is correctly positioned with no overlay or visual glitches
